Name: Blockchain Tycoon
About the game: Blockchain Tycoon is the cryptocurrency simulation game where you build and manage your own mining operation. Create your own coin, mine it, invest in other coins, upgrade and overclock GPUs or you can just HODL. Mine coins in Campaign, Scenario, Challenge, and Sandbox Modes. REALISTIC CRYPTOCURRENCY MINING SIMULATION Simulate a mining operation. Play with realistic reward calculations, halving values based on real world algorithms such as SHA256 or algorithms created and optimized specifically for this game. MINE WITH ASIC AND GPU Variable hashrates for mining hardware depending on the algorithm, so you can build the right setup for maximum profit. PUSH IT TO THE LIMIT Overclock your hardware for the maximum power. TOKENS, EXCHANGE, INVESTING, STAKING Take part in all aspects of the crypto game. Buy and sell tokens. Stake tokens for profit. Invest in other ICOs and try your luck. INITIAL COIN OFFERING Gather your team and create your own currency. Manage your project and raise funds in your ICO. GO GREEN Produce your own power using solar panels and wind turbines.
Meta Title: Blockchain Tycoon: Jan 20, 2021, Wamill and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Blockchain Tycoon? Check out the release date (Jan 20, 2021), developer insights from Wamill, and a complete game summary.
